Heading: Unqualified price
Note: Price applies to all customers that do not fall within any other group with a specified group-specific qualified price

Heading: Member/subscriber price
Note: Price applies to a designated group membership

Heading: Export price
Note: Price applies to sales outside the territory in which the supplier is located

Heading: Reduced price applicable when the item is purchased as part of a set (or series, or collection)
Note: Use in cases where there is no combined price, but a lower price is offered for each part if the whole set / series / collection is purchased (either at one time, as part of a continuing commitment, or in a single purchase)

Heading: Voucher price
Note: In the Netherlands (or any other market where similar arrangements exist): a reduced fixed price available for a limited time on presentation of a voucher or coupon published in a specified medium, eg a newspaper. Should be accompanied by Price Type code 13 and additional detail in <PriceTypeDescription>, and by validity dates in <PriceEffectiveFrom> and <PriceEffectiveUntil> (ONIX 2.1) or in the <PriceDate> composite (ONIX 3.0)

Heading: Consumer price
Note: Price for individual consumer sale only

Heading: Corporate / Library / Education price
Note: Price for sale to libraries or other corporate or institutional customers

Heading: Reservation order price
Note: Price valid for a specified period prior to publication. Orders placed prior to the end of the period are guaranteed to be delivered to the retailer before the nominal publication date. The price may or may not be different from the ‘normal’ price, which carries no such delivery guarantee. Must be accompanied by a <PriceEffectiveUntil> date (or equivalent <PriceDate> composite in ONIX 3), and should also be accompanied by a ‘normal’ price

Heading: Promotional offer price
Note: Temporary ‘Special offer’ price. Must be accompanied by <PriceEffectiveFrom> and <PriceEffectiveUntil> dates (or equivalent <PriceDate> composites in ONIX 3), and may also be accompanied by a ‘normal’ price

Heading: Linked price
Note: Price requires purchase with, or proof of ownership of another product. Further details of purchase or ownership requirements must be given in <PriceTypeDescription>

Heading: Library price
Note: Price for sale only to libraries (including public, school and academic libraries)

Heading: Education price
Note: Price for sale only to educational institutions (including school and academic libraries), educational buying consortia, government and local government bodies purchasing for use in education

Heading: Corporate price
Note: Price for sale to corporate customers only

Heading: Subscription service price
Note: Price for sale to organisations or services offering consumers subscription access to a library of books

Heading: School library price
Note: Price for primary and secondary education

Heading: Academic library price
Note: Price for higher education and scholarly institutions
